column2: ENGLISH
Expel the Order of Our Lady Liberty
I can drive the Order of Our Lady Liberty from my realm and seize their castles. However, it is a very impious thing to do...
Donate 300¤ to the Order of Our Lady Liberty
I can donate money to the Order of Our Lady Liberty in exchange for [Player.Religion.GetPietyName] and lifelong respect from the judicary.
Vassalize the Order of Our Lady Liberty
In exchange for dominion over the [c_palisades.GetName], the Order of Our Lady Liberty is willing to become my vassal.

My [GetFromRelation], [From.GetTitledFirstName], has requested to join the Order of Our Lady Liberty in their quest to preserve and protect the Lady, even though this will forever disinherit [From.GetHerHim].
[This.GetTitledFirstName] becomes a member of the Order of Our Lady Liberty.

Great [Root.PrimaryTitle.GetRulerTitle], your extremely generous donation shall aid us greatly in our quest to serve the will of Lady Liberty! You have my friendship, as well as that of the judicary.

May Lady Liberty watch over you,
[From.GetTitledFirstName]

Most righteous [Root.GetTitledFirstName], the Order of Our Lady Liberty is in need of more castles in order to train troops and generate a supporting income. There is a suitable location in your demesne - in [FromFrom.GetName] to be specific. I am willing to pay you 100 gold in exchange for the right to construct a fortress there.

May Lady Liberty watch over you,
[From.GetTitledFirstName]
The Order of Our Lady Liberty has constructed a castle in [Root.GetName]!

Your majesty, this antagonism is completely unwarranted! The Order of Our Lady Liberty serve at the pleasure of the Lady, but, one has to wonder, do you?

With anger and sadness,

[From.GetTitledFirstName]
Expelled the Order of Our Lady Liberty
My [GetFromRelation], [From.GetTitledFirstName], has requested to join the Minutemen in their struggle against the Redcoat invader, even though this will forever disinherit [From.GetHerHim].
[This.GetTitledFirstName] becomes a Minuteman.
American Legion
Legionary
Legate
Sir
Expel the American Legion
I can drive the American Legion from my realm and seize their castles. However, it is a very impious thing to do...
Donate 300¤ to the American Legion
I can donate money to the American Legion in exchange for [Player.Religion.GetPietyName] and lifelong respect from the High Command.

My [GetFromRelation], [From.GetTitledFirstName], has requested to join the American Legion in their quest to carry out the will of [From.Religion.GetRandomGodName], even though this will forever disinherit [From.GetHerHim].
[This.GetTitledFirstName] becomes a member of the American Legion.

Honorable [Root.PrimaryTitle.GetRulerTitle], your extremely generous donation shall aid us greatly in our quest to defend America and [From.Religion.GetHighGodName]! You have my friendship, as well as that of the High Command.

May [From.Religion.GetHighGodName] protect you,
[From.GetTitledFirstName]

Most righteous [Root.GetTitledFirstName], the American Legion is in need of more castles in order to train troops and generate a supporting income. There is a suitable location in your demesne - in [FromFrom.GetName] to be specific. I am willing to pay you 100 gold in exchange for the right to construct a fortress there.

May [From.Religion.GetRandomGodName] guide your sword,
[From.GetTitledFirstName]
The American Legion has constructed a castle in [Root.GetName]!

Your majesty, this antagonism is completely unwarranted! The American Legion serves the will of the Generals - but do you?

With anger and sadness,

[From.GetTitledFirstName]
Expelled the American Legion
Enclave
Enclave
Commander
Sir
Expel the Enclave
I can drive the Enclave from my realm and seize their castles. However, it is a very impious thing to do...
Donate 300¤ to the Enclave
I can donate money to the Enclave in exchange for [Player.Religion.GetPietyName] and lifelong respect from the High Command.

My [GetFromRelation], [From.GetTitledFirstName], has requested to join the Enclave in their struggle to preserve the creations of [From.Religion.GetRandomGodName] in the Rustlands, even though this will forever disinherit [From.GetHerHim].
[This.GetTitledFirstName] becomes a member of the Enclave.

Honorable [Root.PrimaryTitle.GetRulerTitle], your extremely generous donation will allow us to face the traitors with reneved might! The Enclave salutes you.

[From.Religion.GetHighGodName] with you,
[From.GetTitledFirstName]

Most righteous [Root.GetTitledFirstName], the Enclave is in need of more castles in order to train troops and generate a supporting income. There is a suitable location in your demesne - in [FromFrom.GetName] to be specific. I am willing to pay you 100 gold in exchange for the right to construct a fortress there.

[From.Religion.GetRandomGodName] guide you,
[From.GetTitledFirstName]
The Enclave has constructed a castle in [Root.GetName]!

Your majesty, this antagonism is completely unwarranted! The Enclave is composed of real patriots, unlike you!

With anger and sadness,

[From.GetTitledFirstName]
Expelled the Enclave
Mother Superior
Donate 300¤ to St. Ursula's Chosen
I can donate money to St. Ursula's Chosen in exchange for [Player.Religion.GetPietyName] and lifelong respect from the Church.
Expel St. Ursula's Chosen
I can drive St. Ursula's Chosen from my realm and seize their castles. However, it is a very impious thing to do...
Expel the United Empire Loyalists
I can drive the United Empire Loyalists from my realm and seize their castles. However, it is a very impious thing to do...
Donate 300¤ to the United Empire Loyalists
I can donate money to the United Empire Loyalists in exchange for [Player.Religion.GetPietyName] and lifelong respect from the Church.
My [GetFromRelation], [From.GetTitledFirstName], has requested to join the United Empire Loyalists in their struggle against the infidel, even though this will forever disinherit [From.GetHerHim].
[This.GetTitledFirstName] becomes a member of the UEL.

Honorable [Root.PrimaryTitle.GetRulerTitle], your extremely generous donation shall aid us greatly in our quest to defend the Church and serve the will of [From.Religion.GetHighGodName]!

[From.Religion.GetHighGodName] with you,
[From.GetTitledFirstName]

Most righteous [Root.GetTitledFirstName], the United Empire Loyalists are in need of more castles in order to train troops and generate a supporting income. There is a suitable location in your demesne - in [FromFrom.GetName] to be specific. I am willing to pay you 100 gold in exchange for the right to construct a fortress there.

Pax Christi,
[From.GetTitledFirstName]
The United Empire Loyalists have constructed a castle in [Root.GetName]!

Your majesty, this antagonism is completely unwarranted! The Loyalists serve Christ, but, one has to wonder, do you?

With anger and sadness,

[From.GetTitledFirstName]
Expelled the United Empire Loyalists

I can drive the Golden Bears from my realm and seize their castles. However, it is a very impious thing to do...

I can donate money to the Golden Bears in exchange for [Player.Religion.GetPietyName] and lifelong respect from the gurus.
Vassalize the Golden Bears
In exchange for dominion over the [c_palisades.GetName], the Order of Our Lady Liberty is willing to become my vassal.
My [GetFromRelation], [From.GetTitledFirstName], has requested to join the Golden Bears in their struggle against the infidel, even though this will forever disinherit [From.GetHerHim].
[This.GetTitledFirstName] becomes a member of the Golden Bears.

Honorable [Root.PrimaryTitle.GetRulerTitle], your extremely generous donation shall aid us greatly in our quest to spread the teachings of [From.Religion.GetRandomGodName] far and wide!

May [From.Religion.GetRandomGodName] guide you,
[From.GetTitledFirstName]

Most wise [Root.GetTitledFirstName], the Golden Bears are in need of more castles in order to train troops and generate a supporting income. There is a suitable location in your demesne - in [FromFrom.GetName] to be specific. I am willing to pay you 100 gold in exchange for the right to construct a fortress there.

May your way always be clear,
[From.GetTitledFirstName]
The Golden Bears have constructed a castle in [Root.GetName]!

Your majesty, this antagonism is completely unwarranted! The Golden Bears follow the teachings of the gurus, but, one has to wonder, do you?

With anger and sadness,

[From.GetTitledFirstName]
Expelled the Golden Bears
Expel the Golden Archers
I can drive the Golden Archers from my realm and seize their castles. However, it is a very impious thing to do...
Invest 300¤ in the Golden Archers
I can donate money to the Golden Archers in exchange for [Player.Religion.GetPietyName] and lifelong respect from the gurus.
Vassalize the Golden Archers
As the High Chairman and an Emperor, it is within my power to vassalize the powerful Golden Archers.
My [GetFromRelation], [From.GetTitledFirstName], has requested to join the Golden Archers in their duty to accumulate capital, even though this will forever disinherit [From.GetHerHim].
[This.GetTitledFirstName] becomes a member of the Golden Archers.

Honorable [Root.PrimaryTitle.GetRulerTitle], we are pleased that you have decided to invest in us. This capital shall aid us greatly in our quest to defend the faithful from [From.Religion.GetRandomEvilGodName].

May [From.Religion.GetRandomGodName] guide you,
[From.GetTitledFirstName]

Most wise [Root.GetTitledFirstName], the Golden Archers are in need of more castles in order to train troops and generate a supporting income. There is a suitable location in your demesne - in [FromFrom.GetName] to be specific. I am willing to pay you 100 gold in exchange for the right to construct a fortress there.

May [From.Religion.GetRandomGodName] guide you,
[From.GetTitledFirstName]
The Golden Archers have constructed a castle in [Root.GetName]!

Your majesty, this antagonism is completely unwarranted! The Golden Archers follow the teachings of the Prophet, but, one has to wonder, do you?

With anger and sadness,

[From.GetTitledFirstName]
Expelled the Golden Archers
